item.title: Keith add a quote by Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
item.description: "By virtue of Creation, and still more the Incarnation, nothing here below is profane for those who know how to see." -- Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

item.title: Keith add a quote by St. Ignatius Loyola
item.description: "Go forth and set the world on fire." -- St. Ignatius Loyola

item.title: Keith add a quote by St. Ignatius of Loyola
item.description: "God freely created us so that we might know, love, and serve him in this life and be happy with him forever. God's purpose in creating us is to draw forth from us a response of love and service here on earth, so that we may attain our goal of everlasting happiness with him in heaven. All the things in this world are gifts of God, created for us, to be the means by which we can come to know him better, love him more surely, and serve him more faithfully. As a result, we ought to appreciate and use these gifts of God insofar as they help us toward our goal of loving service and union with God. But insofar as any created things hinder our progress toward our goal, we ought to let them go." -- St. Ignatius of Loyola

item.title: Keith add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it." -- Rumi

item.title: Keith add a quote by Jalal Ad-Din Rumi
item.description:
"Out beyond ideas of wrongdoing and rightdoing there is a field. I'll meet you there.
When the soul lies down in that grass the world is too full to talk about." -- Jalal Ad-Din Rumi

item.title: Keith add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished?" -- Rumi

item.title: Keith add a quote by Hafiz
Keith add a quote by Leonard Bernstein
item.description: "Music . . . can name the unnameable and communicate the unknowable." -- Leonard Bernstein

item.title: Keith add a quote by Leonard Bernstein
item.description: "I'm no longer quite sure what the question is, but I do know that the answer is Yes." -- Leonard Bernstein

item.title: Keith add a quote by Leonard Bernstein
item.description: "Life without music is unthinkable. Life without music is academic. That is why my contact with music is a total embrace." -- Leonard Bernstein

item.title: Keith add a quote by hafiz
item.description: "what is this precious love and laughter budding in our hearts? It is the glorious sound of a soul waking up!" -- hafiz

item.title: Keith add a quote by شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Shams-al-Din Mohammad Hafez
item.description: "For I have learned that every heart will get What it prays for Most." -- شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Shams-al-Din Mohammad Hafez

item.title: Keith add a quote by Hafiz
item.description: "This place where you are right now, God circled on a map for you." -- Hafiz

item.title: Keith add a quote by hafiz
item.description: "I am a hole in a flute that the Christ's breath moves through.....listen to this music" -- hafiz

item.title: Keith add a quote by Walter J. Ciszek
item.description: "... every moment of our life has a purpose, that every action of ours, no matter how dull or routine or trivial it may seem in itself, has a dignity and a worth beyond human understanding... For it means that no moment can be wasted, no opportunity missed, since each has a purpose in man’s life, each has a purpose in God’s plan. Think of your day, today or yesterday. Think of the work you did, the people you met, moment by moment. What did it mean to you- and might it have meant for God? Is the question too simple to answer, or are we just afraid to ask it for fear of the answer we must give?" -- Walter J. Ciszek

item.title: Keith add a quote by Meister Eckhart
item.description: "The eye through which I see God is the same eye through which God sees me; my eye and God's eye are one eye, one seeing, one knowing, one love." -- Meister Eckhart

item.title: Keith add a quote by Meister Eckhart
item.description: "Nobody at any time is cut off from God." -- Meister Eckhart
